title: #185: Forces of Character
description: So, what is character? We always talk about wanting to develop good character, but what exactly does that mean? And once you figure out what it is, how do you go about developing it? Those are the questions my guest today, Chad Hennings, tries to answer in his book, Forces of Character.
author: contact@artofmanliness.com (The Art of Manliness)
